## SQL Snippet: ```js SELECT CustomerID, FirstName, LastName, EmailAddress, LastPurchaseDate FROM Customers WHERE LastPurchaseDate >= DATEADD(day, -30, GETDATE()) ``` ## 2. Data Cleansing â€“ Removing Duplicates Use Case: Remove duplicate email addresses from a data extension.
